webToolDefaultMsg.message: Pick a tool, read the description and click "Run" to run it

webToolSinfoMsg.message: Grab site information from a number of online resources

webToolDirbustMsg.message: Brute force directories and files names on web servers

webToolCscanMsg.message: Perform requests specified by the user

webToolBadDomain.message: WebTools can't run on this domain!

sinfoNoTasks.message: Custom fetch has no tasks enabled. Check your settings!

general-Sleep.message: Delay between consecutive HTTP requests (in milliseconds)

sinfo-GooglecacheOn.message: Most recent archive using Google Cache

sinfo-ShodanOn.message: Grab data from shodan.io (Vulnerable software, Port Data, etc...)

sinfo-WhoisOn.message: Grab raw whois data from whois-search.com

sscan-DirsecOn.message: See if private directories might be open to the public
